main event: A civilian observed a bright white light in the eastern sky on June 6, 1966, in Gahanna, Ohio.
interesting points: The object appeared as an extremely bright white light on the horizon., The observer noted the object was in the east and seemed not far away during the observation., The observation lasted for approximately 1 hour and 20 minutes., The observer estimated the object's speed to be 21,000 MPH and its distance to be about 50 miles away., The object was described as having very ragged edges.
